item.description:
OK, so maybe it isn't Paradise, or even Utopia, but Shangri-La IS a new Asian Fusion Restaurant in Guilford, and I think we should try it. I had lunch there today and was very impressed. They don't have a website yet but the entree's range from $11 to $25. Here are directions ; It is on route 1, at the first traffic light EAST of WalMart, it is right next to the nonfunctioning FONICELLO'S Garden supply store. It is located in a strip mall called "Village Walk". I will post what will eventually be their web address and maybe it'll be up and running soon. Call me if you get lost:

802
233
9060

www.shangri-larestaurantandbar.com

See you there,

Tom

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Shan·gri-la (sh ng gr -lä ). n. 1. An imaginary remote paradise on earth; utopia
